Every day, we scour Amazon to find the best deals available. Whether it's something for your kitchen or top-rated tech to give your smart home an upgrade, the online shopping giant offers some of the best prices on a  very wide range of items. Whatever you need, Amazon has you covered.

Make 2022 the year of good decisions. Start by signing up for our newsletter for twice-weekly tips, reviews and more from our experts.

Below, you'll find our top Amazon deals right now, including one of our favorite air fryer, an affordable robot vacuum and a top-rated streaming device, all of which have been vetted by our team of deals experts to make sure they're "best of web" prices.

If you're not already an Amazon Prime subscriber, you can sign up for a 30-day membership for free. An Amazon Prime subscription gets you free two-day shipping and tons of other benefits for $12.99 a month ($6.49 for students and $5.99 for those receiving qualifying government assistance).

The best Amazon deals of the day

1. A $150 markdown: Our favorite air fryer

Air fryers make the daily task of cooking a whole lot easier, but some of the best models can be pretty pricey. Fortunately, our favorite air fryer, the Philips Premium Airfryer XXL, is currently selling at as much as 43% off at Amazon. Typically listed for $349.95, you can get the 4-quart fryer in black for just $199.95. In testing, we were impressed with this model's large capacity and loved that it made crispy foods (including family-size portions) without preheating. Although this air fryer doesn't have digital controls, making it harder to precisely set the temperature and cooking time, we still found it to be the most user-friendly air fryer we tested. 

Get the Philips Premium Airfryer XXL from $199.95 (Save $98.38 to $150)

2. Under $20: This top-rated streaming device  

Start streaming HBO Max, Disney+ and more on your TV for less with the Amazon Fire TV Stick Lite. Usually listed for $29.99, you can save $11 by picking it up today for $18.99. Designed to provide fast HD streaming, this device is user-friendly and easy to set up. Better still, it has simple button functionality, Alexa voice capability and instant access to thousands of channels and apps.

Get the Amazon Fire TV Stick Lite for $18.99 (Save $11)

3. Save $70: This budget-friendly robot vacuum

The Eufy BoostIQ RoboVac 11S ranked as the best affordable robot vacuum we've ever tested and, right now, it's selling for as low as $159.99—a 30% markdown. We loved the 11S for its ability to pick up more dirt per run (11.6 grams, specifically) than more expensive models from other developers. In testing, its slim design and improved navigation made it capable of moving under furniture and cleaning compact areas. Better still, it ran quietly, rarely making enough noise to even interrupt a conversation. 

Get the Eufy BoostIQ RoboVac 11S Robot Vacuum Cleaner for $159.99 (Save $40 to $70)

4. 38% off: This hydrating face cream

Combat dry skin this winter with Olay Regenerist retinol 24 max moisturizer. Designed to hydrate and refresh your skin, this premium night cream is fragrance-free and non-greasy. According to the brand, when used nightly, the moisturizer visibly smooths and brightens skin. Better still, the face cream comes with a travel size sample of Olay whip face moisturizer. Usually ringing up at $52.99, you can get the top-rated skincare product for just $32.94 right now thanks to a $20.05 price cut. 

Get the Olay Regenerist Retinol 24 Max Moisturizer for $32.94 (Save $20.05)

5. Down $30: This customer-favorite recycling bin

Keep your kitchen neat with the simplehuman rectangular dual compartment recycling kitchen step trash can, currently on sale for $119.99—$30 off the full $149.99 list price. This 46-liter stainless steel receptacle has dual compartments for trash and recyclables, a silent close lid and a fingerprint-proof finish. An Amazon customer favorite, this eco-friendly waste bin has a pedal that is designed to last over 150,000 steps, according to the brand—so this home essential is sure to go the distance. 

Get the simplehuman Rectangular Dual Compartment Recycling Kitchen Step Trash Can for $119.99 (Save $30)

The best Amazon deals from this week

1. 2020 Apple MacBook Pro

If you need a computer that's powerful, compact and can do it all, the 2020 Apple MacBook Pro is loaded up with features and functionality. Typically listed from $1,299, you can get the 13-inch device starting as low as $1,149.99 in the 256-gigabyte model. We picked the 2020 Pro as the best upgrade option for laptops for its best-in-class Apple M1 processing chip that makes for faster app responses and work rates. It also has an impressive 14-hour battery life, a Touch Bar with shortcuts to the apps you're using and a fan to keep the laptop from overheating no matter how much work it's doing.

Get the 2020 Apple 13-inch MacBook Pro from $1,149.99 (Save $149.01 to $199.01)

2. Sporzon! Rubber Encased Hex Dumbbells

Get your reps in at home with these Sporzon! Hex dumbbells, on sale in multiple weights right now. You can get a pair of your preferred size weights ranging from 15-pound weights for $34.99 (29% off) up to 45-pound weights for $45.76 (14% off). Sporzon! says its dumbbells are made from a high-quality cast encased in rubber to make them long lasting and able to be left on home floors over time without denting or leaving marks. They also feature contoured, textured handles for a comfortable grip

Get the Sporzon! Rubber Encased Hex Dumbbells from $34.99 (Save $7.61 to $66.59)

3. Fitbit Devices

For those looking to get more active this year, the best way to monitor progress is a fitness tracker. Fortunately, Amazon has a variety of Fitbit devices on sale today for as much as 30% off. For instance, the Fitbit Charge 5, normally priced at $179.95, is now down to $149.95 thanks to a $30 price cut. The Charge 5 is the best fitness tracker we've ever tested for many reasons, one of them being the compact size meant for maximum comfort and a large-enough screen for easy reading. 

Save up to 30% on select Fitbit devices

4. Nintendo Switch Accessory Package

Nintendo Switch owners can upgrade their gaming experience with this two-pack of device add-ons. Amazon is offering a SanDisk 128-gigabyte MicroSDXC memory card and a 12-month family membership to the Nintendo Switch Online plan together for just $34.99—that's 50% off the package's usual listing price of $69.98. SanDisk says its card not only adds more storage space to your Switch, but it also promises faster data transfers. With the Nintendo Switch Online membership, users can access classic titles from the NES and Super Nintendo era with online data backup to ensure you don't lose your progress.

Get the SanDisk 128GB MicroSDXC UHS-I Memory Card for Nintendo Switch with Nintendo Switch Online 12-Month Family Membership for $34.99 (Save $34.99)

5. Tribit XSound Go Speaker

Turn any occasion into a party with your favorite tunes on the Tribit XSound Go portable speaker. Typically listed for $45.99, this Bluetooth device can be yours for just $23.58 thanks to the already-active $14.55 price cut and the additional 25% coupon on the product page. The pill-shaped Tribit XSound Go is one of our favorite portable Bluetooth speakers under $50 thanks to a metal chassis that made it feel sturdy and its user-friendly labeled buttons. You'll have to blast the volume to truly feel the sound, but the speaker won't vibrate or distort easily. 

Get the Tribit XSound Go Portable Bluetooth Speaker from $23.58 with coupon (Save $6 to $22.41)
